page.original:
&ltTBL>.IS_UNMARKED() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltTBL>.IS_UNMARKED() Description The &ltTBL>.IS_UNMARKED() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the current record is not marked. Example This script checks if the current record is not marked. dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() status = tbl.is_unmarked()
See Also Table Functions and Methods
